scripts.lerna:prepublish: yt ws run --scope ynpx prepublishOnly & yt ws run --scope ynpx build:all
scripts.lerna:publish: yarn run lerna:prepublish && npx lerna publish
scripts.lerna:publish:yes: yarn run lerna:prepublish && npx lerna publish --yes --cd-version patch
scripts.ci:install: npm install -g typescript@next ts-node yarn-tool lerna && yarn
scripts.ci:test: yt ws run --scope ynpx prepublishOnly & yt ws run --scope ynpx test
